name: Two Scarecrows Insulting at each other
name_original: Two Scarecrows Insulting at each other
description:
Two Scarecrows insulting at each other  @quicorax 

Two Scarecrows insulting at each other is a "mini game" based on the insults fight of the game Monkey Island.

How to play:

Press PLAY on the main menu to open the player selection popup, where you can configure the match.

You can configure the player to set a match between: 
Player vs. Player, Player vs. Bot or Bot vs. Bot.

The Bot players can be configured to have more or less chance to win the turn, the available configurations are:

  • Low chance to get the correct answer.
  • Random  chance to get the correct answer.
  • Always gets the correct answer.

At the beginning of the match, the player priority is randomly chosen.

When the turn starts, the player with priority chooses an insult, then, the second player choses an answer to that insult. If the answer is correct, the player that did the insult loses a point and the priority changes.

The match ends when any of the players loses all the points.

Additional Controlls:

ESC (on the fight screen): Open PAUSE popup.
